reviewText:
This miniseries with Louis Gossett, Jr.  showed up in a search for "42".  It was wonderful, only available on VHS, and naturally it was a worry - would it play?

It played perfectly and rewind went well, too.

The description was perfect, and the seller - WESTCOASTRESALE - did a great job.  I guess this is really a recommendation for the seller, not just the video!
This is a great movie of a great baseball player Leroy"Satchel" Paige. It's a must see!!
